title: zKill CLI args contract + defaults
description: Red: add failing tests for required --ship-type-ids parsing and default --max-records=200. Green: implement minimal args parser/validator. Blue: refactor parser helpers with tests green.

title: zKill ship-type pagination ordering + cursor
description: Red: failing tests for newest-to-oldest deterministic ordering and --before-killmail-id filtering. Green: minimal pagination pipeline passes. Blue: factor paging/filter utilities with tests green.

title: Header-aware retry/backoff policy
description: Red: failing tests for header-driven retry delays and fallback exponential backoff. Green: minimal retry engine passes. Blue: cleanup retry utility while keeping tests green.

title: Normalize fitted destroyed+dropped modules
description: Red: failing tests for slot mapping and inclusion of dropped+destroyed fitted modules. Green: minimal normalizer passes. Blue: cleanup slot mapping helpers with tests green.

title: Deterministic dedupe by killmailId + fitHash
description: Red: failing tests for duplicate killmail and canonical fit hash collisions. Green: minimal dedupe implementation passes. Blue: isolate canonical hash logic with tests green.

title: JSONL output + structured errors + manifest
description: Red: failing tests for record/error/manifest schema and counts. Green: minimal writers and manifest pass. Blue: cleanup serializers with tests green.

title: CLI integration + npm script wiring
description: Red: failing integration test for end-to-end args->fetch->normalize->dedupe->write flow. Green: wire CLI script and npm command to pass. Blue: remove orchestration duplication with tests green.

title: Final verify + changelog from git history
description: Red: ensure new behavior tests fail before fixes (tracked in prior tasks). Green: targeted tests + npm test pass. Blue: npm run build last and CHANGELOG.md updated from version-range git history.

title: Add CLI entrypoint orchestration tests and import-safe main
description: Red: add failing tests for help/usage/success/fatal CLI orchestration paths. Green: extract runFetchZkillFitsCli orchestration into scripts/lib/zkill-fit-fetch-cli/cli.mjs and make scripts/fetch-zkill-fits.mjs an import-safe main wrapper. Blue: refactor for clear dependency injection and keep tests green.

title: Run final objective verification and release notes sweep
description: Red: identify any failing coverage gaps against zKill CLI acceptance criteria. Green: ensure npm test passes and expected acceptance tests are present. Blue: run npm run build last and update CHANGELOG.md summary from git range for final objective closure.

title: Dogma new-fit scope contract + tests
description: Red/green/blue for deterministic scope input (scope file + fit-id flags) with dedupe and stable ordering.

title: Scoped parity compare helper + tests
description: Compare only scoped fitIds using existing parity thresholds and deterministic ordering.

title: Scoped pyfa reference sync merge + tests
description: Generate pyfa refs for scoped fitIds and deterministically merge into reference-results.json.

title: New-fit orchestrator CLI exit-policy + tests
description: One command flow: load scope, run scoped sync + compare, enforce non-zero on mismatches.

title: New-fit report + diagnostics artifacts + tests
description: Write reports/dogma-parity-new-fits-report.json and optional diagnostics JSONL.

title: npm script wiring + arg contract tests
description: Add package script and validate --scope-file/--fit-ids ergonomics and errors.

title: Guardrail handling for partial failures + tests
description: Structured continuation for missing corpus, pyfa fail, parse/compute errors.

title: Follow-up AC1 entry gate
description: Add follow-up baseline CLI entry-gate enforcement that aborts before baseline generation when precondition is unmet (TDD red-green-blue).

title: Follow-up baseline 10pct artifact
description: Generate deterministic follow-up baseline summary artifact from parity report with thresholdPolicy metadata and per-hull rollups.

title: Follow-up baseline 10pct artifact
description: Implement deterministic follow-up baseline summary artifact from parity results with threshold policy metadata and stable ordering.

title: Follow-up fit+hull gate evaluator
description: Implement <=10% fit-level gate and per-hull pass/deficit evaluator with cruiser-before-destroyer sequence guard.

title: Follow-up deterministic prioritization backlog
description: Implement deterministic mismatch cluster prioritization with score breakdown fields.

title: Follow-up scoped parity diagnostics alignment
description: Align scoped parity execution/diagnostics for follow-up loops and blockers visibility.

title: T3 cruiser corpus/reference expansion
description: Expand curated T3 cruiser fits/references and add parity coverage tests toward >=10 passing fits per cruiser hull.

title: T3 cruiser mechanic-cluster parity fixes
description: Implement prioritized cruiser mechanic-cluster Dogma fixes with regression fits/tests first.

title: T3 destroyer expansion+fix completion
description: Expand T3 destroyer fits/references, implement fixes, and finalize gate/report completion checks.

title: Follow-up final verification+changelog
description: Run full verification order, update changelog from git history, and emit final follow-up report.

title: T3 cruiser residual Legion/Proteus gate closure
description: Complete cruiser phase gate by resolving remaining Legion/Proteus strict-10pct parity blockers (currently Legion 8/10, Proteus 7/10 after mechanic-cluster fixes), with regression-first fit/test/reference workflow.

title: Refactor hygiene: remove tracked .pyc artifacts
description: Red: add failing tracked-artifact test. Green: delete scripts/__pycache__/*.pyc and add scripts/__pycache__/ ignore. Blue: keep deterministic messages, run npm test and npm run build last, then changelog + commit.

title: Prune unused Dogma engine type exports
description: Step 7 follow-up: add failing static gate for dead engine type exports, remove unused exported types from src/lib/dogma/engine/types.ts, run red/green/blue validation (targeted test, npm test, npm run build), update changelog, commit atomically.

title: Refactor Step2: prune unused imports and cache-test generic helpers
description: Add red-gate static test for known Step2 hygiene targets; remove unused imports in App.paste.integration.test.tsx and breadthPipeline.ts; simplify derivedInference.test.ts cache helper generics; run npm test/build and update changelog.

title: Step3 duplicate-import consolidation hygiene
description: Add deterministic duplicate-import red gate for four scoped files; consolidate imports with no behavior change; validate via targeted tests, npm test, npm run build; update CHANGELOG and commit atomically.

title: Prune dead export surface for Dogma/pipeline Step4
description: Add red-gate static test for getDogmaVersion/getAttr/buildPilotSnapshotKey exports, de-export with minimal edits, run targeted tests + npm test + npm run build, update changelog, commit atomically.

title: Canonicalize zKill rate-limit probe CLI path
description: Step 5: add red gate for probe script duplication, convert scripts/zkill-rate-limit-probe.mjs to thin wrapper over src/lib/dev/zkillRateLimitProbe.ts, run red/green/blue validations and changelog update

title: Canonicalize backtest-zkill CLI to shared backtest logic
description: Step6 refactor slice: add deterministic red gate for backtest script duplication, convert scripts/backtest-zkill.mjs to wrapper over src/lib/backtest.ts orchestration helper, run targeted tests then npm test and npm run build (last), update CHANGELOG for v0.2.9.

title: Step8 final hardening + changelog boundary closure
description: Finalize refactor objective Step 8 by correcting stale v0.2.9 changelog boundary to include commit 6e384db, documenting blocker context, and running required validation order (npm test, npm run build last) with red/green/blue evidence.

title: Perf: memoize fit metric key path
description: Optimize createFitMetricsResolver cache-hit path. Gates: RED add failing test proving repeated lookups for same fit object do not repeat key sort work; GREEN implement per-fit key memoization while preserving normalized-key semantics and pass targeted tests; BLUE cleanup/refactor with tests still green, then run npm test and npm run build (build last).

title: Perf: streamline evidence summarization scans
description: Investigate summarizeEvidenceCoverage/top-ship aggregation loops for repeated scans and preindex opportunities. Gates: RED add failing performance-oriented behavior guard; GREEN minimal refactor preserving outputs with targeted tests passing; BLUE cleanup and verify npm test + npm run build.
